channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A top hurricane forecast is here, and it brings bad news: Danger is already brewing
Why Wall Street fears that Trump's Liberation Day tariffs just sent the S&P 500 into a 'growth scare'
Dow Jones Plummets 1,200 Points On Trump Tariffs; Apple, Nvidia, Tesla Plunge
Stock market today: S&P 500, Nasdaq plunge, Dow drops 1,500 points as Trump's tariffs rip through markets worldwide
Tennessee flood, tornado warnings: Track the latest power outages, damage reports
Which products will be affected by new tariffs announced by Trump?
item.description: President Trump rolled out new tariffs on April 2 aimed at easing trade imbalances. Here's which products could become more expensive as a result.

item.title: Violent storms cut through the South and Midwest, spawning tornadoes and killing 3
item.description: Violent storms and tornadoes tore through cities from Oklahoma to Indiana during what could be a record-setting period of deadly weather and flooding.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Amazon joins bidding war for TikTok as deadline for sale approaches: Sources
item.description: Amazon has now sent a letter to the Trump administration to join the bidding war for TikTok, sources told ABC News.

item.title: What to know about Smoot-Hawley tariffs and their role in the Great Depression
item.description: The measure helped worsen the Great Depression, experts said.

item.title: Dow plunges more than 1,400 points as stocks react to tariff shock
item.description: The Dow opened sharply lower as investors fret over the potential economic impact of President Trump's latest tariffs.

item.title: 2025 Atlantic hurricane season will be above average, researchers predict
item.description: A new forecast from researchers at Colorado State University predicts the 2025 hurricane season will be busier than an average year.

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: Stellantis to temporarily layoff 900 US employees
item.description: Fallout continues after President Donald Trump's unveiling of severe tariffs against virtually all U.S. trading partners.

item.title: WATCH: 7 tigers seized from homeowner with links to ‘Tiger King’
item.description: Seven tigers have been seized from the Nevada home of exotic animal dealer Karl Mitchell, who has ties to the notorious "Tiger King" Joe Exotic.

item.title: Rare life-sized statues of toga-clad couple found in Pompeii tomb
item.description: The couple may have been married, and the woman appears to have been a priestess, researchers said.

item.title: Severe storms in South and Midwest turn deadly
item.description: Violent storms cut through a wide swath of the South and Midwest, spawning tornadoes and killing at least two people, knocking down power lines and tr...

item.title: A historic Black church took the Proud Boys to court. Now it controls their trademark
This is what forecasters mean when they talk about a 100-year flood
